name: Jon Hadley
body:
17 years commercial experience working with a variety of technologies, most recently at [Lobster Pictures](http://www.lobsterpictures.tv/), [Positive](http://positivestudio.co.uk), [Sift Digital](http://www.siftdigital.co.uk) & [Aardman Animations](http://www.aardman.com/). Enthusiastic conference attendee and hacker from Dublin to Tokyo.

Man of science, more or less agog.
